name: Aqua Fresh Swift Model

stagesOfPurification.Pre-Sediment Filter: Removes larger particles like sand, dirt, and rust.

stagesOfPurification.Activated Carbon Filter: Eliminates chlorine, bad taste, odor, and organic compounds.

stagesOfPurification.RO Membrane: Reduces dissolved impurities, heavy metals, and other contaminants.

stagesOfPurification.UV Sterilization: Kills bacteria, viruses, and other microorganisms.

stagesOfPurification.UF Filter: Provides additional purification by removing bacteria and viruses.

stagesOfPurification.Post-Carbon Filter: Enhances the taste and quality of the purified water.

stagesOfPurification.TDS Controller: Maintains essential minerals in the water.

specifications.capacity: Typically ranges from 14 to 16 liters for domestic models.
specifications.flowRate: Depending on the model, it could range from 12 to 16 liters per hour.
specifications.indicators: LED or digital indicators for tank full, purification, and UV function.

benefits: Comprehensive Purification: Multi-stage purification ensures the removal of a wide range of contaminants, including physical, chemical, and biological impurities.
Enhanced Taste: The post-carbon filter improves the taste and odor of the water.
Safe Drinking Water: UV and UF technologies ensure that the water is free from harmful microorganisms.
Essential Minerals Retained: TDS controller maintains essential minerals, making the water healthy to drink.
User-Friendly Design: Easy-to-use interface with indicators for various functions ensures convenience.
Cost-Effective: Reduces the need for bottled water, providing an economical solution for safe drinking water at home.
Eco-Friendly: Decreases the use of plastic bottles, contributing to environmental conservation.
Maintenance: Regular service and maintenance ensure the longevity and efficiency of the system.
